examples.example: 经过半年的努力奋斗，他终于实现了自己的目标。

translate.english: After half a year of hard work, he finally achieved his goal.

examples.example: 这半年来，我努力提升自己，过得充实且快乐。

translate.english: During these half a year, I have been striving to improve myself and lived a fulfilling and happy life.

examples.example: 这半年的生活十分精彩，我收获了许多难忘的经历和珍贵的友谊。

translate.english: The life of this half year is very wonderful, and I have harvested many unforgettable experiences and precious friendships.
